title: 'Tough but ...': Zelenskyy reacts to Biden's decision, lauds him for supporting Ukraine against Russia
Bye, Done: Biden drops out of race, endorses Kamala
content: President Biden announces withdrawal from 2024 race, citing party and country interests. Endorses Vice President Kamala Harris as nominee. Harris poised to make history as first non-white female and Indian-American candidate. Democratic Party begins process to nominate replacement with Harris as frontrunner.
summary: President Biden announces withdrawal from 2024 race, citing party and country interests. Endorses Vice President Kamala Harris as nominee. Harris poised to make history as first non-white female and Indian-American candidate. Democratic Party begins process to nominate replacement with Harris as frontrunner.

title: How Biden and his inner circle blew it

Kamala Harris says she will 'earn and win' Democratic nomination for US President and beat Donald Trump
content: Kamala Harris praised Biden's 2024 exit as 'selfless'. Endorsed, she aims to defeat Trump. Born in Oakland, Howard alumna and SF DA, Harris advocates for reproductive rights. She faced a brief 2020 bid and Obama endorsed her 2010 race. Could be first Black woman nominee. She faces Newsom, Whitmer, Shapiro. Chicago Democratic convention is her first test.
summary: Kamala Harris praised Biden's 2024 exit as 'selfless'. Endorsed, she aims to defeat Trump. Born in Oakland, Howard alumna and SF DA, Harris advocates for reproductive rights. She faced a brief 2020 bid and Obama endorsed her 2010 race. Could be first Black woman nominee. She faces Newsom, Whitmer, Shapiro. Chicago Democratic convention is her first test.

title: Protests continue against Bannu firing
US election 2024: Joe Biden abruptly changed his mind about 2024 race over weekend, says source
US elections: Joe Biden exit sets stage for Donald Trump v Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris, endorsed by Biden, is likely to be the first Black and Indian-American nominee. She inherits campaign resources with support from Pelosi and Obama. A Trump v Harris 2024 clash is anticipated. At a Michigan rally, Trump called her 'laffin' Kamala', displaying sexism, which MAGA followers enjoyed. Trump is seen as unhinged in Democratic circles.
summary: Kamala Harris, endorsed by Biden, is likely to be the first Black and Indian-American nominee. She inherits campaign resources with support from Pelosi and Obama. A Trump v Harris 2024 clash is anticipated. At a Michigan rally, Trump called her 'laffin' Kamala', displaying sexism, which MAGA followers enjoyed. Trump is seen as unhinged in Democratic circles.

title: US election 2024: Reactions pour in as President Biden ends reelection campaign
content: Biden ends reelection bid. Trump labeled him worst president. Schumer, Newsom, Whitmer praised Biden for reducing drug costs, fixing supply chains. Stefanik called for resignation; Trump Jr. criticized Biden and Harris's liberal stance. Pica highlighted climate efforts. Michigan is crucial for Whitmer’s goals; Harris seen as easier to defeat. Biden will address the nation this week.
summary: Biden ends reelection bid. Trump labeled him worst president. Schumer, Newsom, Whitmer praised Biden for reducing drug costs, fixing supply chains. Stefanik called for resignation; Trump Jr. criticized Biden and Harris's liberal stance. Pica highlighted climate efforts. Michigan is crucial for Whitmer’s goals; Harris seen as easier to defeat. Biden will address the nation this week.

content: The recently held Republican National Convention saw Trump downplaying false claims that the 2020 election was stolen from him. However, during his return to the campaign trail on Sunday night, Trump did not hold back.
